timeline.message:
Save to the StorageProvider the DerivationArguments and FastBridgeP2SH hash pair.

It is stored in StorageProvider using as key "derivationArguments- <hash>".
Given the derivationAargumentsdevuelve hash saved value of FastBridgeP2SH.
